Text.Name: BaseWorkSpeed
Text.Desc: The basic working speed of a character. Indicates the amount of work they can complete per second.

Text.Name: BaseEmotionAddV
Text.Desc: The basic mood value of the character.

Text.Name: MaxAge
Text.Desc: The highest age the character can live to.

Text.Name: AgeCostSpeed
Text.Desc: The speed at which the character's life passes by.

Text.Name: VisionRadius
Text.Desc: Maximum distance at which the character is able to perceive their surroundings.

Text.Name: MoveSpeed
Text.Desc: The character's move speed.

Text.Name: ComfyTMin
Text.Desc: Lowest temperature in which the character feels comfortable.

Text.Name: ComfyTMax
Text.Desc: Highest temperature in which the character feels comfortable.

Text.Name: ToleranceTMin
Text.Desc: Lowest temperature that do not affect the character's health.

Text.Name: ToleranceTMax
Text.Desc: Highest temperature that do not affect the character's health.

Text.Name: RecoveryPower
Text.Desc: The character's natural rate of recovery from diseases and injuries.

Text.Name: PainTolerance
Text.Desc: The maximum level of pain the character is able to tolerate.

Text.Name: IntelligenceSkillEXPConstant
Text.Desc: The amount of experience the character gains from pratice. Also affects the speed at which Golden Core Cultivators gain inspiration.

Text.Name: NightmareHappenPercent
Text.Desc: The character's chance of having a nightmare.

Text.Name: NiceDreamHappenPercent
Text.Desc: The character's chance of having a sweet dream.

Text.Name: FatigueConsumeConstant
Text.Desc: The character's energy consumption bonus.

Text.Name: FatigueRecoveryConstant
Text.Desc: The character's energy replenishment bonus.

Text.Name: NutritionConsumeConstant
Text.Desc: The character's food consumption speed bonus.

Text.Name: NutritionRecoveryConstant
Text.Desc: The character's food replenishment bonus.

Text.Name: WaterConsumeConstant
Text.Desc: The character's water consumption bonus.

Text.Name: WaterRecoveryConstant
Text.Desc: The character's water replenishment bonus.

Text.Name: HappyConsumeConstant
Text.Desc: The character's recreation consumption bonus.

Text.Name: HappyRecoveryConstant
Text.Desc: The character's recreation replenishment bonus.

Text.Name: PracticeFoodConsumeConstant
Text.Desc: The character's essence consumption bonus.

Text.Name: PracticeFoodRecoveryConstant
Text.Desc: The character's essence replenishment bonus.
